channel.title: CVE Feed for Nextbricks -- Brickscore
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Nextbricks -- Brickscore

item.title: CVE-2024-43950|2024-08-29T17:57:34.001Z -- nextbricks -- brickscore
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Nextbricks Brickscore allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Brickscore: from n/a through 1.4.2.5.
